description.value: Scenario 1.2b, test 1/2, part 2 for eOverdracht receiving systems. This test (part 1, 2 and 3 together) focuses on the negotiation phase ('aanmeldfase') where the receiving xis proposes an alternative transfer date and the sending xis agrees to this. After completion of this test, the test for the transfer phase ('overdrachtfase') can be run.

The receiving XIS should set the status of the Task to 'on-hold' and fills out the Task.output:alternativeDate slice to signal that it is able to transfer the patient only at some alternative date and time. This should be an update operation where the original Task is sent, with only the status and output elements changed.
Confirm that the Task resource contains 1 Composition reference for the advance notice.
Confirm that the Task.output:alternativeDate slice is populated

The sending XIS now sets the status of the Task anew to 'requested' and replaces the advance notice Composition to signal the receiving XIS that it agrees to transfer the patient at the alternative date and time.

nts:include.description: Set the eOverdracht Task resource to 'requested'.

nts:include.name: Await 'requested' Task notification
nts:include.description: The sending XIS sends a notification to the receiving XIS because the Task has been set to status 'requested' and the advance notice Composition has been updated.

description.value: The receiving XIS should perform a read on the Task after receiving a notification that the Task has been updated.
After reading the Task, the receiving XIS should perform a read operation on the new advance notice Composition that is referenced on Task.input.
